So I wanted to see how well I could make lander legs out of a bunch of lateral decouplers, turns out they are too heavy for the rocket to lift them, but they do make pretty nice launch pad clamps. Just make sure you get out of there before they fall over otherwise the explosion is big enough to wipe out your rocket.

Here\'s a video of them in action.

Hey man great idea imo. Totally going to use this idea on vanilla rockets, was at a bit of a loss as to how to make hold downs for vanilla SSTO rockets. Cheers.
